Close 1,349 views Dec 30, 2015 2014 BMW i3 in London The U.K. government will extend and expand an incentive program for green cars that had been set to end in the coming year. The plug-in car grant was introduced in 2011, and was originally scheduled to expire in early 2016. But the program will now run until March 2018 , with some modifications, according to The Guardian.
